text: Timothy A. Tetrick, born November 22, 1981 in Flora, Illinois,Tim Tetrick at Meadlowlands Racing & Entertainment is an American Harness Racing driver. Tim started driving Standardbreds at a very young age and on November 27, 2007 broke the record of number of wins (1,077) in a single year. Tim drove his 1,078th winner at Dover Downs in Delaware on the way to recording 1,189 wins that year.Tim Tetrick with an all-time record 1188 Tetrick won the 2012 Hambletonian Stakes with his horse Market Share.Market Share wins Hambletonian He won his 8,000th career race in March 2014.Tim Tetrick youngest to win 8,000 races He was voted Harness Tracks of America Driver of the Year for 2007, 2008, 2012, and 2013 by the US Harness Writers Association. He underwent hip replacement surgery in early December, 2008 for a congenital hip problem, but was back competing by late January 2009. Tetrick's colors are green and gold. He is also recognizable on the track by the bright yellow wheels on the sulky he drives. He has been a resident of Runnemede, New Jersey.Tim Tetrick, Meadowlands Racetrack. Accessed February 8, 2017. "Residence: Runnemede, NJ" In the last 10 years he is considered one of the worst drivers in Harness racing based on inconsistent and lack of effort drives. ==References== ==External links== *Tim Tetrick Making his Mark *Tetrick Wins Number 1,078 *Tetricks Returns After Surgery https://www.harnessracing.com/news/main/timtetrickreflectson10000careerwins Category:People from Flora, Illinois Category:People from Runnemede, New Jersey Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American harness racers Category:Dan Patch Award winners
title: Tim Tetrick
